name: Irekae IQ Crossword DX
summary:
"If you replace the letters, the words will be completed!!" This is the second new type crossword puzzle will make you feel addicted!

This time, while keeping the simple and easy-to-understand rules, you can enjoy it, such as increasing the number of problems and adding a national ranking function!!

In addition, the voice of the characters is included, and they support and liven up in various scenes. The comical degree and cuteness are doubled!

The number of problems is also greatly increased!

There are three types of game modes: "World Mode" that clears the stage within the time limit, "IQ Test Mode" that determines the player's IQ level, and "Free Mode" that solves problems without worrying about the time limit.

The number of recorded questions has been doubled compared to the previous work, and you can now play crosswords until you are satisfied!

Test your skills with players from all over the country!
If you send data of the score in "World Mode" and the IQ index in "IQ Test Mode", you can participate in each national ranking.

There are 3 types of rankings, "1 day", "monthly" and "total" with different aggregation periods, so if you get good results, register more and more data and aim for the top!
